biotools.summary: Tool that, for a given regulatory protein and prokaryotic genome, predicts binding sites and operons. The user selects a prokaryote genome and provides an ungapped multiple sequence alignment representing the binding site. The tool reports back with predicted binding sites and downstream co-regulated genes.

bioschemas.name: PredictRegulon
